event: Earliest human presence in present-day Nicaragua
Indigenous societies develop agriculture and lake-based settlements
Mesoamerican cultural influence spreads into western Nicaragua
Chorotega and Nicarao peoples dominate the Pacific region
Spanish conquest of western Nicaragua begins
Granada is founded as a colonial city
Le√≥n is founded as a colonial administrative center
Region develops as a colonial frontier between oceans
Joins the Federal Republic of Central America
Filibuster William Walker briefly seizes power
Civil conflict ends and democratic transition begins
